General.Name: Chih Lien Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Chih Lien Industrial Co., Ltd. produces and supplies steel wires and steel bars in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers high and low carbon, free cutting, bearing, alloy, spring, and cold heading steel wires, as well as free cutting, carbon, tool, alloy, spring, and stainless-steel bars. Its products are used in industrial machinery, precision parts, bicycles, motorcycles, automobiles, tools, household products, electronics, OA machines, springs, furniture, construction, and other industries. The company was founded in 1973 and is headquartered in Taoyuan City, Taiwan.
General.Address: 480, Chung Shing Road, Taoyuan City, Taiwan, 32749
